title: [Grawood Farmstead, Meadow]
description: Wildflowers dot the vibrant green of this open meadow, and fireflies and starflies dance together just above the faces of the blossoms.  The grass is tall enough here that it almost reaches knee-height, and it whispers as night breezes brush through the blades.

Wildflowers dot the vibrant green of this open meadow, and butterflies of all hues flutter through the air, occasionally alighting upon one blossom or another.  The grass is tall enough here that it almost reaches knee-height, and it whispers faintly as breezes periodically brush through.
paths: Obvious paths: north, east, south, west
room.location: Grawood Farmstead outside of River's Rest
